content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message with a shell command to activate the environment, which I executed. The message contained a command to execute a shell with a specific command line to activate the environment and echo a message. The message was sent by an AI response and the command line included the path to the miniconda directory.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: source: not found\\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "source /root/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: source: not found\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
